Description: SO9156 Distributed model training with Kubeflow on AWS and Amazon SageMaker

Fn::Join:
#!/bin/bash 
echo 'Executing userdata script ...' | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log 
chmod 666 /tmp/bootstrap.log; chown ec2-user:ec2-user /tmp/bootstrap.log 
date | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log 
yum install -y aws-cfn-bootstrap git | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log 
cd /home/ec2-user; git clone https://github.com/aws-samples/aws-do-eks.git | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log; cd aws-do-eks; chown -R ec2-user:ec2-user /home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks 
bash -c /home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-aws-cli.sh | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log 
bash -c /home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-eksctl.sh | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log 
bash -c /home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-kubectl.sh | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log 
bash -c /home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-kubectx.sh | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log 
bash -c /home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-kubeps1.sh | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log 
sudo su ec2-user bash -c '/home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-kubeps1.sh | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo su ec2-user bash -c '/home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-cloud9.sh | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo su ec2-user bash -c '/usr/local/bin/eksctl create cluster -f /home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/eks-kubeflow.yaml | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo su ec2-user bash -c 'source /home/ec2-user/.bashrc; sleep 2; aws eks update-kubeconfig --name eks-kubeflow | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo su ec2-user bash -c 'source /home/ec2-user/.bashrc; cd /home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/nodegroup; CLUSTER_NAME=eks-kubeflow CLUSTER_REGION=us-east-1 nodegroup_name=nodegroup nodegroup_min=6 nodegroup_size=6 nodegroup_max=12 ./eks-nodegroup-scale.sh | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo su ec2-user bash -c 'source /home/ec2-user/.bashrc; cd /home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/deployment/csi/efs; ./deploy.sh | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo su ec2-user bash -c 'source /home/ec2-user/.bashrc; cd /home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/vpc; CLUSTER_NAME=eks-kubeflow REGION=us-east-1 ./vpc-endpoint-create.sh | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo su ec2-user bash -c 'source /home/ec2-user/.bashrc; cd /home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/iam; CLUSTER_NAME=eks-kubeflow AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=us-east-1 ./node-role-expand.sh | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo su ec2-user bash -c 'source /home/ec2-user/.bashrc; cd /home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/iam; AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=us-east-1 ./sm-role-create.sh | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
date | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log 
echo 'Done executing userdata script.' | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log
